message: Same things on info. Promotion program selling Camel Lights Cigarettes in a blue lit tin with Silver trim. I wish to know if you have any more of the tins in stock. I am looking to replace the tin I lost. Could you please send one as a limited edition tin filled with Camel cigarettes by United States. Let me know the cost in this situation. Your hostage. May I have the address of the Company as you can see. General, it said made in Germany on the 8395.
postage_stamp: The Postage Stamp is designed for John William Bartram, American Botanist.
